hero.title: Business Funding Options
hero.subtitle: Discover grants, tax incentives, and funding support available for commercial solar installations in Ireland.

items.title: SEAI Support Scheme for Renewable Heat (SSRH)
items.desc: Grants for businesses investing in renewable energy systems. The scheme provides financial support to help businesses transition to cleaner energy sources and reduce operating costs.

items.title: Accelerated Capital Allowances (ACA)
items.desc: Write off 100% of the cost of qualifying energy-efficient equipment in year one against your corporation tax. This significantly reduces the effective cost of your solar investment.

items.title: SEAI Community & Business Grants
items.desc: SEAI offers various grant programmes for businesses and community energy projects. Our team stays up to date with all available schemes to maximise your funding.

items.title: Commercial Finance Options
items.desc: We work with leading finance providers to offer flexible commercial lending solutions. Asset finance, leasing, and green loans are all available for qualifying businesses.

helpSection.title: We Help You Access Every Euro Available
paragraphs: Navigating business grants and funding schemes can be complex. Our team has extensive experience helping businesses access all available funding, ensuring you minimise your upfront investment.

We provide a comprehensive breakdown of all applicable grants, tax incentives, and finance options as part of your free consultation ‚Äî so you can make an informed decision with full visibility of costs and savings.
